name: Shitty Bird
description:
Flap, flap, poop!

Shitty Bird was created at the November Mini Game Jam in Berlin. Theme was "How did that happen?"

This game is based on actual events. A colleague of ours went outside our office building for a quick smoke, carrying a cup of coffee. Suddenly a pigeon flew over him and managed to poop directly into his mug.

This event inspired us to use the Leap Motion Controller and allow players to enter a bird's perspective and try this challenge for themselves.
